acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Barksys, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Barksys provides price comparison services across multiple online marketplaces. We aggregate pricing information to help users make informed purchasing decisions.

userObligations.title: 3. User Obligations
userObligations.content: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the service.

limitation.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Barksys shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service.

changes.title: 5. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the service.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Barksys respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we handle your personal data and your privacy rights.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including name, email address, and usage data. We also collect information about your interactions with our service.

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use the data we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to comply with legal obligations.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also object to processing or request data portability. Contact us to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information to improve and analyze our service.

errors.cannotRevokeOtherSessions: Cannot revoke sessions of other users

profile.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your plan?
profile.passwordDescription: Click the button above to change your password

search.subtitle: Search for products and compare prices in real-time
search.welcomeDesc: Enter a product EAN code above to see real-time price comparisons from multiple marketplaces
search.searchError: Error performing search. Please try again.
search.searchFailedAll: All searches failed. Please try again.
search.noProductsFound: No products found for this EAN

calculator.title: PVP Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Calculate your retail price
calculator.toggleSubtitle: Calculate your price and see where you stand
calculator.helpText: All values update automatically. Adjust the fields to see your final price.

recommendation.excellentDesc: Your price is among the best in the market. Great positioning to attract customers.
recommendation.goodDesc: Your price is competitive. You have a good chance of making sales at this price point.
recommendation.averageDesc: Your price is around the market average. Consider adjusting to stand out more.
recommendation.highDesc: Your price is higher than most competitors. Unless you offer added value, consider reducing it.
recommendation.very-highDesc: Your price is significantly above the market. Strongly consider adjusting to remain competitive.

common.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
